name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論專利申請後的答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practice of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in this class.

notes: 智財所與電機大四合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生通過包浩斯開啟的基礎幾何練習，理解點、線、面，乃至線條、方塊、色彩等元素影響視覺性、閱讀性的因素，最後，通過與藝術理論的交互驗證和課堂討論，以進入當代藝術創作精神。
description.en: The course aims to explore the possibilities with forms, lines, rhythms, and content in contemporary visual arts. The pedagogy of the course is inspired from the Bauhaus, which is one of the most significant modern movements in the history of art and design.  In class, the mission is to guide the students to experiment the variety of geometric shapes, from lines to circles and from circles to triangles, pursuing the essence and the spirits within the contemporary art. As practicing visual arts, the students not only learn how to develop an artwork, but also rethink the significant relation between art forms and meanings through the tutor-led and group discussions.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

name.en: Intellectual Property in Mergers and Acquisitions

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。
description.en: This course is to achieve the following purposes:(1)	To understand the structure of M&A laws.(2)	To be familiar with M&A practice.(3)	To be fluent in M&A EnglishFor the mid-long term goals, this course is to cultivate M&A lawyer, chief legal officer and financial-economic law judge.

notes: 中英授課，日職合開，一堂課限12人，共科513教室上課

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

notes: 日職合開，與光電大四及光電所合開，本所限12人

description.zh: 演化計算最佳化與傳統最佳化的最主要差別在於演化式計算係透過迭代方式逼近最佳解。由於所使用的目標函數可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，因此更適合處理實務的工程問題。演化式計算緣起於演化式規劃，基因演算法則透過數學模型的推導，驗證其可以使用在解決最佳化問題。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Evolutionary Computing and conventional computing in that it obtains the near optimal solution through iterations. Because of the characteristics of the fitness functions, the evolutionary computation is more tolerable for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost.  As a result, the evolutionary computation can be more suitable for solving engineering problems. The origin of the evolutionary computation is from the Evolutionary Planning.  Through a formal mathematic modeling, the Genetic Algorithm is proved to be used to solve optimization problems. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES). Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), Simulated Anneal (SA) will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹深度學習及其在語音處理、影像處理、自然語言處理等領域之應用及其最新發展趨勢。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to deep learning and its applications for speech recognition, image processing, and natural language processing. It will also cover recent development of deep learning.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋嵌入式工業視覺系統完整的開發內容，從機器視覺系統流程與演算法設計、嵌入式系統實作、函式庫封裝、人機介面設計、工業相機取像及實際案例分析。其中包含: 1. 嵌入式系統軟體實作：Linux 環境介紹與基本程式設計 2. Qt 人機介面開發 3. 工業用機器視覺演算法/系統開發，並提供相關設計概念 4. 實際應用案例與設計流程介紹。學生需要先有C/C++程式語言及影像處理之基礎。
description.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic tools and techniques required to implement Machine Vision on small, embedded, portable platforms. The primary focus will be on the design of industrial vision system based on specialized embedded hardware, with a little less focus on machine vision algorithm. The course will involve: (1) Linux embedded software development; (2) Qt GUI development; (3) development of embedded industrial machine vision algorithm; (4) application practice on the embedded platform, with an industrial camera, to demonstrate real time vision processing. The only pre-requisite for the course is to know C/C++ and image processing.

description.zh: 1.動態系統之機械負載：加速度、摩擦、位移及外力負載  2. 動態系統之模型化處理 3. 動態模擬與分析 4. 電腦輔助動態模擬 5. 結論
description.en: 1. System dynamic mechanical loading effects, including inertia, friction, displacement and forcing effects. 2. Dynamic system modeling 3. Dynamic analyses and simulations. 4. CAD-simulations  5. Conclusions.

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en: Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

description.zh: 本課程講授內容兼顧理論與實務。促使學習土木工程學生瞭解施工安全及衛生的重要性，如何規劃推動各項安全管理實務工作。確認施工觀念，發揮全面防災功能，確保施工安全與衛生。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: Safety and disaster preclusion of opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering etc.

notes: 土木大三大四合開/上限30人

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

name.zh: 無人機攝影測量概論與實作

description.zh: 運用無人機技術做為測遙工具為一新穎科技，本課程以航空動力學為前題，分別介紹定翼及旋翼型無人機運作原理，基於航空攝影目的介紹飛行及航拍任務規劃。同時藉由實作，學生將自行組裝及設計無人機，並實際自行拍攝影像、產製所需之空間資訊，如:正射、地形等地理資訊系統圖資。
description.en: The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV), commonly known as a drone, is an aircraft without human pilot on board that flies autonomously, and is now been used widely for many aspects because of its convenience, high resolution, efficiency, etc. This course introducing first the aerodynamic of different drone frames, as well as the basic photogrammetry. Then try to design and assembly our drones. By using the home-made drones, the students will learn how to do the mission planning and take photos. Finally, the students should generate the geomatic information from their acquired images.

notes: 土木大三與防災所合開/ 大學25人

name.en: Introduction of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 講授土木工程領域之相關災害的種類、特性、影響，如地震、洪泛、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染等。探討其災害消減及預防規劃，並藉由風險管理的觀念介紹緊急應變計畫的準則。
description.en: This course introduces the types, characteristics and influences of civil engineering related disasters or hazards, such as earthquakes, floods, solpe failures, debris flows, and construction incidents. The hazard mitigation and precaution will also be discussed in class. By the concepts of risk management, the principle of emergency response plan will be introduced.

description.zh: 使學者了解水利工程實務及水利工程設計之基本原則。課程內容概要：(1)水利工程概述、(2)發電計畫、(3)有效落差(4)水路設計、(5)水路結構物設計、(6)水路結構物維護(7)其它。
description.en: Scientific basis of the hydrologic cycle and its engineering implications;rainfall-runoff process,hydrographs,flood routing,and statisticalmethods.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topic includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程將可增進學生撰寫不同種法律文件之能力，包含律師函與其回覆、契約、內部備忘錄與信件。本課程將包括法律寫作的基礎、格式與範例、撰寫與修訂的練習、同儕審查、講授者進一步的回覆。於此課程結束後，學生經由不同種指定作業所完成的各類別文件，將可大輻度改善其寫作技巧。
description.en: This course will improve the ability of students to draft a wide variety of legal documents in English, including formal demand letters, responses to demands, contracts, internal memorandums and correspondence.  It will include instruction concerning the basics of good legal writing, forms and examples, practice in drafting and revising, peer review, and intensive feedback from the instructor. By the end of the course, students will have greatly improved writing skills and the beginnings of a sound collection of forms to assist with diverse writing assignments in their business.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換2.         機械手臂運動學3.         機械手臂反向運動學4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力5.         機械手臂動力學6.         軌跡規劃7.         機械手臂控制8.         機器視覺9.         工業自動化應用10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

notes: 電機所.自動化所.電資外生.機械自動外生班合開

description.zh: (1)馬克斯威爾方程式，勞倫斯電磁定律，波印亭定律 (2)平面電磁波：電磁波極化，電磁波之行進波之反射、折射、駐波 (3)導波理論：平行波導，矩形波導，介質波導 (4)傳輸線與史密斯圖表 (5)天線理論：位能函數，半波天線及天線陣列。
description.en: To familiarize the student with basic principles,methods,and tools of computer graphics.Topics include :1.Generation of 2D and 3D gometruc shapes2.2D and 3D transformation3.Hidden surfaces and hidden lines techniques 4.Color principles 5.Shading and shadowing techniquesThe student will be nequired to write computer programs and/or use modeling/redendering packages

name.zh: 智慧產品整合設計專題
name.en: Special Topics in Integrated Design for Smart Products

description.zh: 本課程介紹最新理論、方法與工具的設計實務應用，以及使用者、科技與商業的跨領域整合，以提升學生在策略層次上的設計概念化和具體化能力。內容包括一套整合創新設計理論方法、美學、人因、工程與永續的研發路數。學生將於智慧產品設計案中演練跨領域應用研究所需的知識技能。
description.en: This course focuses on teaching conceptualization and embodiment design for best practice of industrial design by applying state-of-the-art theories and methodologies, and by integrating user, technology and business aspects. At a strategic level, it provides an integrated approach to the advanced studies in innovative design theory and methods, aesthetics, ergonomics, engineering, and sustainability. Multidisciplinary applied research is embedded in a smart product project.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

notes: 日職合開，全英授課，一堂課限12人

description.zh: 本課程主要為台灣專利申請之文件，其相關的主題包括：專利之檢索、專利文件之閱讀，以及專利申請書、說明書、申請專利範圍與圖示等之撰寫。
description.en: This course focuses on the prosecution for Taiwan’s patents. The topics will include patent search, reading and drafting about patent specification, claims, figures and son on.

description.zh: 本課主要講授民法第三編物權篇的規定。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches the rules of the third chapter of Civil Code. The third chapter defines property rights of our civil law system. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

name.zh: 電子科技產業智權管理
name.en: IP Management in Electronic Technology Industry

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹電子科技產業趨勢及智權管理策略，第一部分介紹電子科技產業發展趨勢；第二部分介紹一般科技產業之智權管理策略與模式；第三部分以個案研討方式，帶領學生討論產業之智慧財產權管理實務，包含品牌管理、專利佈局策略、商標申請與運用、著作權議題、營業秘密之保護等相關案例。
description.en: This course will introduce the industrial trends and IP management strategies, including the followings: 1. development trend of electronic technology industry, 2. IP management strategies and model of technology industry, 3. To discuss the intellectual property management practices of the related industries, including brand management, patent portfolio strategies, trademark application strategies, copyright issues, the protection of business secrets and other related cases.

description.zh: 本課程講授英美契約法。其他資訊請參閱英文概述。
description.en: This course teaches basic rules of contract law applied in the United States. While contract law is a law of a state, this course does not focus on any specific jurisdiction. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課程主要講授重點包括刑事訴訟之程序與執行等，並將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於刑事訴訟法的瞭解。本學期內容包括刑事訴訟基本理念與原則、迴避、管轄與強制處分。
description.en: This course focuses on the proceeding and enforcement of the law of criminal procedure. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Law of Criminal Procedure for the students. In this semester, major topics will include the basic concept, disqualification, jurisdiction and prosecutors' order of the law of criminal procedure.

description.zh: 本課程將深入我國專利法，同時簡介美國及大陸專利法。本課程內容主要涵蓋：專利申請、可專利標的、專利要件及要求、專利審查流程、專利權之實施、專利侵害判斷、專利檢索及專利說明書之撰寫。其他內容尚包括簡介專利訴訟流程、專利行政救濟流程、法院及智慧財產局之角色以及專利法與其他智慧財產權法之關係。
description.en: This course will go through R.O.C. (Taiwan) patent law in detail, and introduce to the U.S. and China patent laws. Topics will mainly include patent filing, patentable subject matter, patent conditions and requirements, patent examination procedure, patent enforcement, patent infringement assessment, patent search, and patent drafting. Other topics include introduce to patent litigation procedure, patent administrative suit procedure, the roles of the court and the Intellectual Property Office and the relationship between patent law and other Intellectual Property laws.

description.zh: 本課程係將個別半導體製造程序視為獨立單元，運用化工單元操作的概念，併同現有半導體產業與未來發展趨勢的分析介紹，再輔以積體電路元件的設計原理，期使具化工背景人員能從製程、設備、元件原理等各方面取得一對半導體製程的整合性觀念。課程內容：(1)產業概覽(2)積體電路基本技術背景(3)積體電路設計(4)積體電路製造(5)內連線RC延遲電路與放大電路(6)金屬化製程技術(7)平坦化製程技術(8)物理氣相沉積與化學氣相沉積技術(9)線層/阻障層/種晶層(10)金屬填充/金屬互連(0.5~0.18um)(11)銅製程整合(0.13um含以上)(12)基極/位元線路/電容器(13)積體電路製程相關設備
description.en: In this class, the specified semiconductor process is considered as specified unit. By use of the concepts which belong to the chemical engineering unit operations to interpret the analysis / introduction in semiconductor industry and future developing trending. (Also including the theories of VLSI devices) The students who have studied professional chemical engineering courses for many years, can acquire completed and integrated viewpoints in semiconductor process. description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

description.zh: 本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。

A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.zh: 應用定量分析法於水資源規劃與管理，並介紹系統分析、本益比之評估、多目標規劃與風險評估。
description.en: Quantitative analytical methods in water resources planning and management; introduction to systems analysis, benefit/cost, multi-objective planning and risk assessment.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。

A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh: 本課程研究建築細部設計，並幫助學生發展建築和其組成元素之間的關係的理解，藉由分析和設計練習如何建造的邏輯、建築元素的製造與組構，接頭、以及整個結構的組織構成，以確保具備技能來面對在建築細部設計中的挑戰。本課程也透過各種材料和工法的探究，以及銜接設計概念與構築過程，為學生在細部設計上提供多樣化的創作可能性。
description.en: The course studies architectural detailing, and helps students to develop an understanding of the relationship of architecture and its elements, for ensuring their skills and capabilities to the challenges in detailing for architectures as well as researching the existing cases in built examples, through one series of trainings of analyzing and practicing the logic of construction, fabrication of architectural elements, joints, and the organization of entire structures. By engaging in various aspects of materials and methods, this course aims to provide students the unlimited creative possibilities in Detail Design by making connections between the design concept and fabrication processes.

name.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務

description.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務內容包括輪胎平衡與校正、車輛四輪定位診斷與校正、輪胎拆卸操作與油電系統故障的檢測。學生將學習儀器操作的基本要求，並練習熟練適當工具的使用，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: Automotive diagnostic equipment operating practices include tire balance, vehicle wheel alignment, Changing tire operation and hybrid electric system failures inspections. Students will learn the basic requirements of instrument operation and practice with appropriate tools. This course focuses on the implementation of the exercise.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。
description.en: Automobile Chassis Service Shop Practice , the basic inspection, adjustment and repair of Automobile Chassis System, Include the Automobile Suspension systems, Steering systems and Braking systems, Tire Repair and Balance practice, Wheel-Alignment practice , Chassis dynamometer Experiment , Brake performance and Slide Test .

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.en: Automobile Electrical System Service Shop Practice , Include Service of the Engine Electrical System , Starting and Charging System, Ignition System, Battery inspection and replacement, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System, New Electronic Equipment Inspection , Air Condition Test and Repair.For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , this class is to utilize computers to do the experiments on different vehicle/engineering problems. Student will learn the basic concept of Finite Element Method (FEM), learn how to utilize FEM in Vehicle Engineering to solve problems. description.en: Introduction to Modern Computer Integrated Manufacturing System and Manufacturing Planning, Manufacturing Operation, Assembly and Inspection. Meanwhile, discuss the essential knowledge of manufacturing engineer, Engineering Materials, Principles of Manufacturing Process, as Casting, Forming, Material-Removing, Joining and Surface Technology, Machine Tool Structures and its control Technologies, Automatic Production Systems, Metrology and Quality Control.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。

description.zh: 導論（含系統概論、資料表示法），微電腦結構－中央處理單元，組合語言－指令型定址法，模組化程式，位元組和字串處裡，I/O 程式，DOS 功能常式，多元程式規劃，系統匯流排結構，I/O 介面，半導體記憶，多元處裡器組態。

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: This course will provide students with the computational fundamental skills necessary to plan and manage the construction management (such as schedule, cost, and quality management) using related computer project management software or system packages. Students will learn to mix and match available resources in the most efficient combinations to complete projects on time and within budget. Furthermore, the student may utilize computational programming to efficiently plan and execute municipal infrastructure programs (simulations and analysis) and support contractors’ decisions in constrained projects.

notes: 土木大三大四合開/上限25人

description.zh: 近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1)了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2)評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3)新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。學習成效：學生可獲得：(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en: The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

name.zh: 分子模擬於化學工程之應用
name.en: Molecular simulation and its applications in chemical engineering

description.zh: 本課程目標學生為各實驗室專題生及研究生。短程目標為介紹分子模擬之基礎，使同學透過分子和原子層級的觀點，重新理解手邊實驗觀察的成果，以增加對本身研究結果的認知。長期目標是透過課程所提出且完成之研究題目，向自己指導教授提出計畫書。經指導教授核可後，再與授課老師合作完成該項跨領域研究，和其本身的實驗研究結果結合，可望發表在更頂尖的期刊上。
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce students of different backgrounds the basic skills of molecular simulation for them to formulate computational study in their own research area. Students who are willing to take this course should work on an active research project (Master’s thesis or undergraduate research in their junior and senior year) and should have their advisor’s consent.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
description.en: This course deals with management accounting and control both within a micro-behavioural and within an organisational theory perspective. The aim is to provide an understanding of the developments in management accounting and control theory and practice and the implications of critical variables that affect the design, development and operation of management accounting and control systems. Practical aspects of management accounting are mainly examined through computer assisted learning (CAL). Students are expected to cover the prescribed reading on their own, and to perceive the taught seminars as the opportunity to ask questions and to offer their views at any time.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨"兩難" 甚至"多難"的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，”倫理”的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

description.zh: 本課程為傳統攝影的影像處理訓練。透過傳統暗房的操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念，可以訓練學生對事物的敏感度，耐心細心。
description.en: This course is a traditional photographic image processing training. Through traditional darkroom operations, training students the concept of image quality, sensitivity to things students can be trained, patient care.

description.zh: 本課程將與結合社區力量，透過對艋舺龍山寺周邊人文歷史、社會民俗、商業變遷等，討論艋舺代表性的台灣本土文化。
description.en: The course will combine the power of the community, through the periphery of the Longshan Temple in Wanhua human history, social customs, commerce, etc. Changes to discuss Monga representative of Taiwanese culture.

notes: 大碩合開課；人數上限大學部25人、碩班10人

description.en: The course will combine the power of the community, through the periphery of the Longshan Temple in Wanhua human history, social customs, commerce, etc. Changes to discuss Monga representative of Taiwanese culture.

notes: 大碩合開；人數上限大學部25人、碩班10人

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh: 當代飾品設計及製作是一門以實作為主，實務講述為輔的設計性課程。透過實務教學進行，提供學生基礎金工珠寶的製作能力並進行應用。課程旨在結合金屬工藝與多元媒材的當代趨勢，引導學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: This course will use a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and practical experiences to educate the student in the basic skills required to work as a member of jewelry design discipline. This class will also be an introduction to the multiple media of design. Contemporary Jewelry Design will provide an overview of the professional world of Jewelry design through a practical exhibition.

notes: 共科9樓工藝教室，人數上限18人

name.en: The Marketing and Management of Cultural Industry

description.zh: 本課程旨在以文化事業發展為目標，將品牌價值極大化作為核心，分析新創品牌之經營策略，進而設計與執行品牌之行銷方案，以及創造出文化產業中的優勢品牌與品牌資產。
description.en: The course is designed to target the culture vocational development, emphasize the maximum of a brand value, decompose the strategy of a new brand value, design and implement its marketing programs, and then create the advantages of the brand equity in the cultural industry.

description.zh: 本課程將先從隨機變數的內容開始並主要介紹消息理論的基礎與應用。本課程的將涵蓋下列內容：    (1) 熵值，相對性熵值與互訊息    (2) 漸近等分理論    (3) 隨機程序的熵速率    (4) 資料壓縮    (5) 消息理論與賭博    (6) 頻道容量    (7) 差別熵值    (8) 高斯通道
description.en: This class starts from the review of random process and mainly provides an introduction to information theory. The following is a rough description of the material covered in this class.    (1) Entropy, Relative Entropy, and Mutual information    (2) Asymptotic equipartition theorem    (3) Entropy rates of stochastic processes    (4) Data compression (Huffman coding, Shannon codes, Kraftinequality, etc.)    (5) Information theory and gambling    (6) Channel Capacity    (7) Differential entropy    (8) Gaussian Channels

notes: 電機所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: 電機所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊(及訓練演算法，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等．
description.en: This introductory course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of this course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, this course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optiminizations, random search, decision tree,  random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model (with its training algorithm), support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques (LDA, PCA, ICA, FA), boosting methods, decision

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開、限20人

name.en: Principles and Applications of Data Science

description.zh: 資料科學探索如何從大量、多元、非結構化的資料中發掘有價值的資訊，並有效提供相關的應用策略，探討的層面包括：資料處理及計算、資料儲存、數理統計及資料分析技術與應用等。本課程討論此一領域的進展，並使學生了解相關知識與技術工具，進而具備資料科學思維及應用能力。課程內容以廣度為主，主題包含資料管理、資料分析、資料視覺化、機器學習、深度學習，巨量資料等。
description.en: Data science explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to applications. It is integrative cross data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and skills of data analysis. This course introduces this rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques. The course will be given on breadth, rather than depth, and its topics include data management, data analysis, data visualization, machine learning, deep learning, big data, etc.

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開

name.zh: 計算生物學及醫學資訊

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與計算生物學及醫學資訊學相關之重要主題。 學生能夠了解如何正確分析生物和醫學數據所衍伸的問題及應用。 希望透過課程協助同學了解和學習如何組裝基因體資料和醫學數據分析中經常使用的演算法技術內容，閱讀最新相關生醫技術論文及使用開放工具，增進實際操作之經驗或自行建構分析生醫相關資料之應用系統。
description.en: This course is designed to provide important topics in computational biology and medical informatics. Students are able to learn about problems involved in the generation and analysis of biological and medical data. The course intends to provide good understanding of the commonly used algorithms and public tools in the analysis of genomic and medical data, to read updated scientific reports, and to increase hands-on experiences with accessing and using relevant databases.

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９.MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video2.Intraframe Coding3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video   Transmission6.Coding of Synthetic Video7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others9.MPEG Standards

notes: 資工所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. description.zh: 本課程以“智能工業生產教學工廠”為學習場域，是一間無人的關燈工廠，這間智能工廠的建置完全與廠商實際生產需求結合，全球最大高階自行車變速器製造商美商速聯公司(SRAM)林孟輝總廠長擔任建廠諮詢顧問，整間工廠完全由北科大跨系所老師帶領學生自行建置，這是一間全國大學第一條由老師帶領學生團隊自行建置完成的智能化生產製造產線，產線包括加工區、精密量測區、線上品管區、組裝區、自動倉儲，從接受訂單到智能化排單、加工、量測、品管、組裝、倉儲，所有雲端伺服器與程式軟體完全由學生自行架設與撰寫，是一條完全無人化的關燈展示生產與教學工廠。上課方式是廠商針對智能工廠各個工作細節具體提出實務需求，再由上課老師帶學生助教以此些問題作為上課基礎，教導學生共同解決，學生以班級為單位進入工廠實作學習，課程由負責建置“智能工業生產教學工廠”的老師依其專長領域分工合作開課，依據老師負責建置的部分及其專長進行分工教學，學生分組由個別老師帶領指導，學生將可依序學到完整工廠技術，學期結束再由各專長老師依照學生分組指導學生進行專題報告，學生的專題報告將以個別老師專長協助解決的問題撰寫報告，這樣的設計可以讓學生深入了解與探討如何解決問題。
description.en: This course is based on the intelligent manufacturing system education factory which is an unmanned and turn off the light factory. The intelligent factory is completely built by ourselves and is the only one self-built factory in Taiwanese universities. Building the intelligent factory is cooperated with SRAM, a global bicycle parts manufacturer, and their director Jacky Lin is our technical consultant. The intelligent manufacturing system has seven areas, central server, reception, automatic warehouse, manufacturing, measuring, on-line quality control, and assembly. In process, we receive the raw materials and scanned by QR code scanner. After scanned, the raw materials are transported to the warehouse and wait for producing order. If the producing order received, the raw materials will be sent through all seven machines, where a finished component will be manufactured. description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 各種有機化合物之檢驗以及常見有機化學反應之實習。
description.en: It covers the testings and preperations of common organic compounds.

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，車輛空氣動力學機構，空氣動力學，汽車空氣動力特性，卡車空氣動力特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，汽車行駛安全與舒適，汽車行駛噪音與防治方法，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
description.en: Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, Some aerodynamics fundamentals of fluids mechanics, Aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, Directional stability, Safety and comfort, Wind noise, Mechanisms of noise generation and transmission, Design features。

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

notes: 工管三四與工管所合開；計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生針對不同情境、特定議題加強口語和閱讀能力。此課程以口語訓練為基礎，藉由閱讀相關文章，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握語言技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their speaking and reading ability on some special topics in different situations. It will be an oral-based course, and through reading relative articles, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use the language fluently.

name.zh: 基礎英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

description.zh: 針對高級班學生強化以英文思考及批判整合之進階英文能力，本課程以經典及流行之英文電影為主要教材，分析及應用進階英文的架構、風格及語言特色。
description.en: This course examines a wide variety of classic and popular English language films in order to help advanced students develop their English and critical thinking skills. The course centers its emphasis on the understanding and application of discourse, style and linguistic features of English in films.

description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Mechanical & Electrical Engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. name.zh: 文法寫作及西方哲學概論
name.en: Advanced Grammar, Writing and Introduction to Western Philosophy

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來寫出關於西方文化傳統的基礎概念，如蘇格拉底以前，柏拉圖、荷馬的純哲學以及政治哲學。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種關於課堂閱讀的哲學家的段落寫作。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to read and write about basic concepts from the Western Philosophical Tradition from the pre-Socratics, Plato and metaphysics to Hobbes and political philosophy. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about the philosophers we shall read. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.en: Basic Grammar and Writing about Popular CultureIn this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to writing and conversation about many products of popular culture including fashion, design, music videos, cartoons, pixar, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.en: This course aims to help students have a broader view on different cultures and a better understanding of western civilization through reading Western Classics. This course offers a survey of some of the greatest and most influential works on Western literature, philosophy and culture, making non-English major students have a strong base in humanities.

description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 在電子化與網路化之經營環境下，生產製造與服務過程中，都會蒐集其中自動產生或人工輸入的資料。本課程學習在資訊平台上，以統計與分析方法以處理大量資料混雜時的管理決策問題，以萃取出有價值的資訊或內隱的知識，做為決策支援與管理之依據。除介紹問題基本特性，說明資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: Amount of data are collected automatically during manufacturing production and service process. This course aims to introduce how to apply big data analytic and statistical methods for decision making with amount of data and then extracting useful rules or patterns for decision support and management. In addition to lecturing, this course also training students how to analyze the data and learn problem solving techniques through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 物聯網能讓所有能行使獨立功能的普通物體實作互聯互通的網路，在物聯網上，每個人都可以應用電子標籤將真實的物體上網聯結，在物聯網上都可以查出它們的具體位置。通過物聯網可以用中心電腦對機器、裝置、人員進行集中管理、控制，也可以對家庭裝置、汽車進行遙控，以及搜尋位置、防止物品被盜等，類似自動化操控系統，同時透過收集這些小事的資料，最後可以整合成大數據。物聯網將現實世界數位化，應用範圍十分廣泛，包括運輸和物流領域、健康醫療領域範圍、智慧環境（家庭、辦公、工廠）領域、個人和社會領域等，具有十分廣闊的市場和應用前景。本課程將介紹物聯網基本概念、相關技術與應用。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) is the network of physical objects—devices, vehicles, buildings and other items — embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity that enables these objects to collect and exchange data. The IoT allows objects to be sensed and controlled remotely across existing network infrastructure, creating opportunities for more direct integration of the physical world into computer-based systems, and resulting in improved efficiency, accuracy and economic benefit. In this course, concepts, technologies and applications of IoT will be introduced.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

notes: 工管大二合開;計中電腦教室

name.zh: 基礎泥塑與預防性維護

description.zh: 傳統泥塑常見於傳統建築之中，泥塑與剪黏交趾陶同歸一處，包含於傳統建築六大匠師的系統內，至今仍實屬於台灣珍貴的傳統工藝之一。在本課程中，學員們可習得基礎傳統泥塑之操作能力與專業知識，兩次的校外作品賞析與傳統泥塑延伸工藝的體驗，讓學員得以從不同視角重新理解傳統泥塑，並透過簡單的實作完成兩件泥塑設計的作品。
description.en: Traditional clay sculpture is commonly found in many Chinese traditional architectures. Clay sculptures and Koji pottery are of the same kind and both included in the six traditional Chinese architectural arts.  They are regarded as the treasure heritages of Taiwan traditional crafts.In this curriculum, students will learn the professional knowledge of traditional clay sculpture and have the chances to practice the basic steps of making the clay sculpture. To complete two pieces of clay sculptures is required during the course.  There will be two classes of field study, visiting traditional Chinese architectures (e.g. temples or buildings).  During the visiting, students can appreciate the beauty of this fine art and see the transformation of a traditional clay work to art work.  The field study will also enhance their understanding of clay sculptures from a new perspective.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

name.zh: 進階廟宇彩繪修復與預防性維護
name.en: Advanced temple painting repair and preventive maintenance

description.zh: 傳統彩繪是一門貼近生活的民俗工藝，宮廟、佛寺、老宅院皆可看見這門傳統藝術，但國人對此並不熟悉，這些均可以是在地文化，文化創意產業的發源。透過本堂課希望學生能重新認識台灣這門珍貴的民間藝術，也透過實際操作更了解傳統彩繪的作法與精神。
description.en: Traditional painting is a close folk technology to Taiwan human’s life. Palace temple, Buddhist temple, and old mansion can investigate this traditional art but the Taiwanese are not familiar with this, these items could be the basics concerning the land culture and the cultural and creative industry originated. Through this teaching, the class aims to lead the students can re-understand the precious folk art of Taiwan and also learn more about the practice and spirit of traditional painting through practical operation.

description.zh: 透過教學，使學生了解古蹟之建築過程與方法，並實地進行田野調查工作，以培養同學欣賞古蹟建築之美。上課以講授、討論為主，並輔以課外教材（視聽教材）及戶外實地調查，使學生能學以致用，培養對傳統建築工法之實際運用。
description.en: The goal of the course is designed to make all students acquaintance with the processes and the approaches of historical remains through lecturing by the field research to develop the independent abilities of field study. All the lessons are mainly based on lectures and mutual discussions, partly based on videos and audio materials and fieldworks.

description.zh: 量化研究是當代社會與行為科學的強勢典範，統計分析則是量化研究的核心，本課程之目標在於介紹量化方法研究學理、統計知識與基本統計軟體的操作技巧，俾使學生具備使用量化資料驗證研究假設、閱讀統計報表、撰寫研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the theories of quantitative research, basic knowledge about statistics, and the skills of statistics package software in order to enable students to test the hypotheses via quantitative data, interpret report results, and write formal academic reports.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en: Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

notes: 大碩合開  「修習課程需至校外」

With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

name.zh: 數位行銷多媒體應用實務
name.en: Application of Multimedia Design in digital marketing

description.zh: 數位行銷已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容並輔導同學考取多媒體設計證照，為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach how to design the multimedia in the digital marketing and help students pass the certification .

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

name.zh: 智慧製造執行系統演練
name.en: Practice of Intelligent Manufacturing Execution System

description.zh: 製造執行系統(MES)在產品從工單發出到成品產出的過程中，扮演生產活動最佳化的資訊傳遞者。MES運用即時、準確的資訊，指導、執行、回應並記錄工廠活動，從而能夠對條件的變化做出迅速的回應、減少無附加價值的活動、提高工廠運作過程的效率。MES不但可以改善設備投資報酬率，而且有助於及時交貨、加快庫存周轉、提高收益和現金流的績效，MES在企業和供應鏈間，以雙向交互的形式提供生產活動的基礎資訊。本課程將介紹MES概念及基本功能，並透過模擬與實作來讓學生了解MES之特性。
description.en: Manufacturing Execution System (MES) is the major information exchange portal of product records from order releasing to shipping. With real time data, MES allocates, implements, and responses to fulfill the production plans rapidly and at the same time improves the resource utilization by limiting non-value added activities. The benefit of using MES includes better performance in equipment ROI, on-time delivery, inventory turn-over rate, and hence higher revenue and cash-flow. Data collected by MES is served as the communication venue within the supply chain. This course focuses on the concept and basic functions of MES through simulation sections and practical cases.

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 製科所、機電所與自動化所合開

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

description.zh: 「民事訴訟法(1)」是本課程的第一個部分，此部分旨在向修課同學作民事訴訟法之概括介紹，而此一介紹包含下列三個重點：一、民事訴訟法之立法背景二、民事訴訟法之理論三、民事訴訟法之解釋方法參與此部分乃理解民事訴訟法之關鍵一步，修課同學將受益匪淺。
description.en: “Civil Procedure Law(1)” is the first part of this course, aiming to give participants a general introduction to the Civil Procedure Law, and the introduction contains the following three points: 1. The legislative background of the Civil Procedure Law.2. The theories of the Civil Procedure Law.3. The interpretive methods of the Civil Procedure Law.Attending the part is the critical step to understanding the Civil Procedure Law and benefits participants a lot.

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

notes: 計中電腦教室, PBL ,大三、大四、研究所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹一系列的光學系統設計概念。其講授內容有單元一：基礎光學與像差理論，單元二：鏡頭設計，單元三：光學系統設計。透過光學實務的研習，可以建立一套完整的光學設計基礎理論，可以協助在研發的光學工程師，在創新發明的競爭戰場上佔得先機，研發順利。
description.en: In this course, we will introduce a series of concepts of the optical system design. The contents are comprising of unit 1: optics basic and aberration theory, unit 2: lens design, unit 3: optical instrument system. The students can build up optical design skills through the practical experiments in the computer examples.

notes: 必選二選一，大三、大四合開，已修習過者請勿重覆修

description.zh: (1)生醫與光學基礎(2)電子膠囊、內視鏡 (3)顯微鏡相關 (4)光學單離 (5)光學嵌住 (6)雷射美容治療相關 (7)光譜分析 (8)光動力治療、光觸媒法 (9)光學斷層掃描 (10)表面電漿子技術 (11)螢光光電檢測 (12)生物晶片(13)放射線影像
description.en: (1) Basics of bio-optics (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering(3) Microscopy (4) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection (5) Laser trapping (6) Laser and skin effects(7) Spectral technology (8) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD) (9)Optical Coherence tomography(10) Surface plasmons (11) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis (12) Biochip Technology(13) Bio-imaging

notes: PBL，大三、大四、研究所合開，已修習過者請勿重覆修

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2. explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

notes: 光電大碩與產業接軌合開/擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓同學學習顯示面板相關的理論與瞭解先關產業動向；除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識；此外，本課程內容也包含各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。
description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

notes: 配合友達面板工廠與GOLF系統,課程有時彈性調為整天

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 一教101；工設三四與日職創新所合開/創新創業課程

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1.光學基本定律(3) 2.球面光學系統成像(3) 3.雷射光傳播特性(3) 4.光纖(6) 5.輻射度學與光度學(3)二、物理光學   1.光的電磁理論(3) 2.光波的疊加與分析(3) 3.光的干涉與干涉儀(6) 4.光學鍍膜(3) 5.光的繞射(6) 6.光的偏振(3) 7.晶體光學基礎(6)
description.en: A、Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

notes: 計中電腦教室, PBL ,光電三四碩與電資外生合開

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

notes: 本課程邀請智財法官、學者等講授，與智財所合開

name.zh: 電動車機電整合工程師能力培育
name.en: Training for Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 本課程之目的是協助學生考取經濟部專業工程師考試「電動車機電整合工程師能力鑑定」證照，課程內容依照考試科目內容，包含：電動車產業趨勢、各系統基礎原理、機電整合系統的重要元件、各子系統整合的基礎原理；電池技術概論及模組管理與電力安全防護系統、其他系統匹配、?輛動力系統性能設定、動力系統整合、微處理機與介面、電機機械原理、電機驅動原理。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to guide the student to pursue the certification of “Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles” for professional engineers. That is provided by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The contents are: trend of electric vehicle (EV) industry, principle of each system, key components of mechanical and electrical integration system, principle of system integration, battery concept and module management of electric safety, system matching, setting of vehicle powertrain, integration of powertrain, microprocessor and interface, principle of electromechanics, principle of electrical driving.

notes: 車輛大碩與產業接軌合開/週一234節，共12週
